title: Carbohydrate NMR chemical shift prediction by GeqShift employing E(3) equivariant graph neural networks
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26585-26595
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03428G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Maria Bånkestad, Kevin M. Dorst, Göran Widmalm, Jerk Rönnols
Visual abstract of GeqShift, an E(3) equivariant graph neural network for predicting carbohydrate NMR shifts. The model excels in stereochemical invariance, offering superior molecular geometry understanding over traditional methods.
